backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access‑controlled admin and user roles supporting allowlist management and editable user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file across components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme definitions using custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component controlling authentication, authorization, profile loading, and routing between sign‑in, unauthorized, and main app views.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteAdmi: Admin interface for viewing, adding, and removing allowlisted principals with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for setting a user's display name and emoji before saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication with a styled hero layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/Unauthorize: Displays an access‑denied message and allows the user to sign out if not authorized.
frontend/src/components/MainApp.tsx: Main authenticated view showing user info, member list, and optional admin controls with logout support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllowlistAdmin.ts: Hooks for fetching and mutating allowlist entries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthzStatus.ts: Determines whether the caller is authorized by querying their role and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller's profile and retrieving all user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining a warm color palette and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (query or hash), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with fallback logic, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings for the project's theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, features, requirements, and metadata for the private access website.
